name: manufacturing-knowledge-base
description: Manufacturing and field service assistant for regulatory compliance and maintenance
retrievalInstructions: For queries about regulatory compliance → use manufacturing-ads-source. For queries about maintenance, repairs, specs → use manufacturing-manuals-source. For queries about incident causes, investigations → use manufacturing-investigations-source. Always prioritize latest ADs over older manuals or reports if compliance is in question.
answerInstructions: Answer as detailed as possible but start off with TLDR
